description: This low and slow cooked lamb curry is meltingly tender and packed with flavour.
name: Slow Cooker Lamb & Lentil Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g lamb neck steaks, trimmed, chopped into chunks
2 medium red onions, peeled and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and brown the lamb and onions for 5 minutes. Stir in the garlic, ginger and curry paste and cook for 3 minutes.
Pour over the tomatoes, a can full of water and lentils and bring to the boil. Tip the mix into a slow cooker on high and cook for 3 hours, until the lamb and lentils are tender.
Stir in the spinach and half of the coriander and cook for 10 more minutes to wilt. Serve with chopped coriander on top and rice or naan, if desired.
